title: B.K.S. Iyengar Dies At 95; Sickly Child Became Yoga Guru
teaser: Commentator Sandip Roy, an editor with Firstpost in India, has an appreciation of yogi B.K.S. Iyengar. Iyengar, who died on Wednesday, helped to introduce the practice of yoga to the Western world.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
